name: Kiwis' adventures
description:
Kiwi's Adventures is a fun 80's style 2D platforming game.

  • Play as Kiwi the Kiwi Bird, collect the magical kiwi fruit to earn lives and set your foes alight.
  • Make your way though a string of seemingly endless rooms, with photographs from all over the beautiful country, New Zealand, in the background.
  • Try to beat the game. There is no save feature. When you die go right back to the very beginning of the game. Which makes that moment you finally beat the game all that much sweeter.

If you like platforming games then Kiwi's Adventures is the game for you
